universal_guidelines: Do not use dark gradients. Use light, airy backgrounds (stone-50).
Ensure all touch targets are at least 48px x 48px (Apple Guidelines).
Animations: Use 'framer-motion' if available, otherwise CSS transitions (duration-200 ease-out).
Input fields MUST have 'text-base' (16px) font size to prevent iOS zoom on focus.
Data-testids are mandatory for all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, list items).
